duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee Risk Advisory and Consulting Services division (RACS) for analyzing data and reports and timely collection of outstanding invoices.
Create specialized reports to support customer invoices and collections data.
Set up new customer details in ERP to support billing process.
Implement and document automated billing and collections with the Finance and Product Development teams.
Perform monthly analysis of customer invoices and follow up on payment status.
Provide responses to inquiries from customers and internal teams regarding collection efforts.
Represent the company in handling challenges to billing amounts and resolve/settle invoice disputes.
Develop and implement training and guidance materials related to billing and collections operations.
Review work product of financial operations support analyst and edit or modify reports produced.
Conduct bad debt analysis and reporting.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree or higher in Business Administration, Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field
